index.p1: With an account on {server_name} you'll be able to create entries and join groups.

p: OpenTEK is a free and open source platform to document and share traditional ecological knowledge (TEK). Specifically, OpenTEK's focuses on knowledge related to the use and management of (agro)biodiversity and the impacts of climate change.
The platform is designed as a progressive web-app (PWA) allowing users both to visualize existing geolocalized data and to collect new data from any device and while in the field.
OpenTEK is linked to two citizen science projects documenting traditional ecological knowledge around the world: LICCI (www.licci.eu) and CONECT-e (www.conecte.es).

LICCI wants to bring insights from local knowledge to climate research and policy. To do that, LICCI documents and classifies local observations of climate change impacts (e.g., changes in rainfall patterns or impacts of weather changes on wild animal abundance).

CONECT-e aims to revitalize and protect traditional ecological knoweldge related to plants and landraces in Spain. To do so, CONECT-e documents (and protects with Creative Commons licenses) plant's traditional uses, management and local names (e.g., medicinal plant uses or landrace names and cultivation practices).
This application is funded primarily by the LICCI and ICCION projects of the European Research Council (Grant Agreement Nr. FP7-771056-LICCI and ERC-2019-PoC-899209).

This application has also received funding from the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme. The JRC, or as the case may be the European Commission, shall not be held liable for any direct or indirect, incidental, consequential or other damages, including but not limited to the loss of data, loss of profits, or any other financial loss arising from the use of this application, or inability to use it, even if the JRC is notified of the possibility of such damages.

Registration in OpenTEK implies the express free informed consent of the user or its carer/guardian to participate and transfer their personal data and traditional knowledge to the platform under the following conditions:
- All information in the platform will be anonymized and only used for research and advocacy purposes, without it being transferred to third parties.
- All users have the right to withdraw from the project and delete their profile data and entries from the platform at any time they wish.
- The personal profile data voluntarily provided by the user will be treated confidentially and only used for research purposes, without it being public.
- The traditional ecological knowledge voluntarily provided by the user will be shared under the privacy and license options the user selects

- All users have the right to present claims to the Catalan Data Protection Authority and to reach out to the UAB data protection service (proteccio.dades@uab.cat). For more information about your rights as a research subject, you can also contact the Ethics Commission of the Autonomous University of Barcelona at ceeah@uab.cat
- Users agree that the data which they provide will be transferred to and stored within the borders of the EU.

OpenTEK only collects data the user is freely and willingly providing. We do not use cookies nor do we include any 3rd party cookies. We only store the data that you directly provide in your public user profile or in the entries you create or contribute to. Users agree that the data which they provide will be transferred to and stored within the borders of the EU.

about.html: We are making use of the mapbox API for map display. APIs and Mobile SDKs: We automatically collect certain technical information whenever requests are made to our APIs, including (a) IP address, (b) device and browser information, (c) operating system, (d) the content of the request, (e) the date and time of the request, and (f) limited location and usage data. We delete IP addresses after 30 days. In addition, when a mobile application uses our SDKs to access our APIs, it may send us certain limited location and usage data along with an ephemeral ID. We delete this ephemeral ID within 24 hours and do not associate it or the unprocessed mobile location data with any personally identifying information, including names, permanent IDs, email addresses, IP addresses, or phone numbers. We also collect randomly-generated IDs for the limited purpose of analyzing the use of our APIs, including the number of active users. We will delete the randomly generated IDs and the content of requests made to our APIs after 36 months. See more details here: Mapbox Privacy policy

profile.research_info: Answering these questions is optional. The information is only used for research purposes of the creator of OpenTEK

actor.deactivated: This user is no longer active

reset_mail_sent.p1: We've sent an email to your address. Click the link in the email to reset your password.
reset_mail_sent.p2: If you don't see the email, check other places it might be, like your junk, spam, social, or other folders.

location_privacy.label: Location privacy
location_privacy.description: Specify the settings for the protection of the exact locations of your entries

offline.label: Offline mode
offline.description: If you have the offline mode activated you can still create entries while being offline

fixed_domain.p: You are only seeing the domain
fixed_domain.p2: However there are more domains to explore. Resetting your fixed domain, will show you a domain overview on the home page. Click the button to reset the fixed domain.

delete_account.p1: If you have not posted content publicly, all the private entries that you created without any collaborator and user information will be permanently deleted. If you have posted entries publicly, these entries will continue to be stored and publicly available and we will continue to retain basic user data (you username and public name) so your connection with them is preserved. All private entries without other collaborators will be deleted. Those with collaborators will remain.
delete_account.h2: The following entries will be deleted
delete_account.h3: Please provide your credentials to verify your identity

user_query.label: Username or email
user_query.rule: Input doesn't seem to be a valid username nor email address

alt_descr.ui: Select a language for the overall user interface
alt_descr.domain: Select a language for all forms and entries

password.label: Password
password.rule_length: Password must have at least 8 characters

public_name.label: Public name
public_name.rule_length: Your public name must have between 2 and 30 characters

user_description.label: @.capitalize:w.description
user_description.descr: Write something about yourself and about your background

privacy.label: Privacy
privacy.descr: Should this entry be publicly visible?

alt_descr.default: Choose a default privacy for all your entries
Public entries are visible to everyone

private.descr: Only you or users you shared the entry with can see it.

alt_descr.default: Private entries are only visible to those you share them with

license.label: License
license.descr: Choose a creative commons license for this entry. Read about the licenses.

alt_descr.default: Choose a default creative commons license for your entries. Read about the licenses.

collaborator.label: Collaborator
collaborator.descr: Collaborators can edit this entry as you can (except for changing the privacy, license and roles).

shared.label: Visible to
shared.descr: The following users can read your entry even if it's private

entrypreview.outdated: Created from an outdated version. Some values might change. Download the entry before updating is recommended

creator_switch_dialog.title: Creator changed
creator_switch_dialog.text: This draft was created by {original}. Do you want to change the creator to {user}?

cancel.title: Dismiss draft
cancel.text: Are you sure you want to dismiss this draft?

delete.title: Delete entry
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

entry_actions.saved_text: Your entry is saved in the browser until you submit or cancel the creation.

not_logged_in.title: You are not logged in
not_logged_in.text: You can submit observations but they need to be reviewed before they get published. In addition to that their privacy is automatically set to public and their license is set to (CC0) - No Rights reserved/public domain.

entry_validation.has_missing_t: Incomplete entries cannot be submitted. Please, add the missing information or save your entry as a draft.
entry_validation.ok: All values in this entry are ok.

msgs.listitem_incomplete: {aspect_label} has at least one incomplete item: {invalid_item_msgs}

location_asp.descr: Search for a place or click on the map to set the location
location_asp.offline: You cannot set the location while beeing offline

options.rnd: The exact location is not visible, but a randomly moved location (max.50km) (yellow marker).
options.exact: The exact location will be visible.
options.region: The location's administrative unit (region) will be visible (yellow marker).

privacy_notification.p: We do not use cookies nor do we include any 3rd party cookies. We only store the data that you directly provide in your user profile or in the entries you create or contribute to. Read our privacy policy for more information.

w._global.asp_location_privacy.descr: Specify the settings for the protection of the exact locations of your entries
